Body: Just a reminder everyone, don't forget about the quizzes, CDRX tokens and bragging rights are at stake!!üí™üôå Questions coming throughout the day, don't miss them!!‚ò∫Ô∏è‚úåÔ∏è  For those who like prizes, here's your chance to become a master quiz player ü§ìü§ìü§ì  Here is how it works:  ‚öôÔ∏è There will be 3 quizzes posted at random times every day, containing only one question. The first person to answer each question correctly will win 20 CDRX tokens.  All correct answers win admiration from the CDRX staff and moderators!  Each question will have a unique hashtag and participants will have to submit their answers using the same hashtag. If the hashtag of the question is #1 then you must start your response using #1. Please see the example below:  Question: #1 Do crypto depository receipts (CDRs) give you a legal right to a stock/bond, or just reference them?  Your response: #1 CDRs give you a legal ownership of a stock/bond [full answer for the master quiz player would also state that the stock/bond is held on the token holders' behalf by a depository bank/trust]  üí∞ Please note that the prize will only be given to the FIRST person to answer a question correctly.  üîë Prizes will be distributed 14 days after the completion of the Token Sale.  ‚ö°Ô∏è You will have MANY chances to win a prize üöÄ  Good luck and may you all be quiz masters! Author: BestKait
Title: [ANN] CDRX - INTRODUCING A FUNDAMENTAL SHIFT IN GLOBAL FINANCIAL MARKETS
Body: Hey folks! We have another news piece for you to check out!  Crypto Depository Receipts: New Take on an Old Solution Can Drastically Change Equity Ownership & Issuance  CDRs feature all the benefits of conventional equity ownership and issuance without the drawbacks and can thus make life much easier for both investors and issuers. Apart from leveraging the high speed, transparency, and immutability of blockchain, they will help to reduce costs significantly. For instance, there will no longer be a need to conduct regular meetings of shareholders, pay numerous accountants, or maintain a share register. Many routine corporate actions can be eliminated or automated. Since CDRs are issued on the blockchain, smart contracts embedded in them will enable the automated distribution of dividends and permit online voting, drastically reducing the current costs associated with these actions (which run into millions of dollars).  Read more: https://cryptovest.com/news/crypto-depository-receipts-new-take-on-an-old-solution-can-drastically-change-equity-ownership--issuance/

Voting and announcements will be handled through smart contracts and fractional ownership means small scale investors, who are not able to participate in the traditional market, can now have a chance to own a fraction of stock, such as Apple or Amazon.  You can read more about it following this link üëáüëáüëá  https://www.techbullion.com/cdrs-will-allow-fractional-ownership-of-top-stocks-like-apple-and-amazon/  Also, if you haven't already, please join the project's telegram channel at https://t.me/cdrxchange

Title: [ANN] CDRX - INTRODUCING A FUNDAMENTAL SHIFT IN GLOBAL FINANCIAL MARKETS
Body: Hello all! Hope the community is doing great  The CDRX team is very excited to bring this piece of news to you guys!  "Have you ever turned on the news and watched the financial section? Apple Inc., the maker of iPhone‚Äôs current stock price is hovering around USD 220, Google Class A stocks are touching USD 1200 and Amazon is even higher at 1900 odd Dollars. Has there ever been a slight regret that you should have bought the shares when they were cheaper, or that you might not ever be able to make it as big as heavy investors because you can‚Äôt afford to get a single share?  With major corporations running their business successfully, big investors are on the lookout to trade in for the shares and earn some heavy money through dividends. The even increasing stock value of successful companies mean that ordinary people, with not much of a big investment, cannot afford to buy these shares. Eventually, they are left to trade and transfer shares of little value and are effectively cut off from big stocks.  CDRX is a decentralized platform that has the perfect solution to the problem."  Read More https://www.techbullion.com/want-to-buy-apple-stock-with-10-cdrs-can-make-that-happen/

Author: FIEX
Title: [ANN] CDRX - INTRODUCING A FUNDAMENTAL SHIFT IN GLOBAL FINANCIAL MARKETS
Body: Great to see the full benefits of CDRs starting to catch on - it is not just a win for investors, its also a win for issuers as well! üéâüéâ  Read the full article here on Medium: https://medium.com/@BountyBase/benefits-of-cdrs-and-native-issuance-to-token-issuers-c3e8e69159f6  What Makes CDRs and Native Issuance So Effective?  The CDR is a securitized, digital representation of an underlying share (or bond). Each CDR is securitized and backed one-for-one by a share or bond held by the custodian. The owner of the CDR has legal ownership to an underlying security held in a depository bank on their behalf. Mechanically, it is similar to a currency-backed stable coin.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] CDRX - INTRODUCING A FUNDAMENTAL SHIFT IN GLOBAL FINANCIAL MARKETS
Body: CDRX‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäBlockchain Technology in the Traditional Securities Market  CDRX.IO is a platform that will bring blockchain technologies into the traditional stock market. CDRX is a decentralized platform that integrates security tokens tied to real assets of companies.  Each security token is a CDR (Crypto Depository Receipts). Thanks to the CDR, each token has the same rights as shares (bonds)‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthe right to receive dividends, vote, etc. All operations will take place with pairs of security-tokens linked to shares and other cryptocurrencies on their own CDRX exchange. There will also be added securitized cryptocurrencies such as: ETH, BTC and XRP.  Read more: https://medium.com/@Vladar49/cdrx-blockchain-technology-in-the-traditional-securities-market-43a6c5263734

Your response: #1 CDRs give you a legal ownership of a stock/bond [full answer for the master quiz player would also state that the stock/bond is held on the token holders' behalf by a depository bank/trust]  üí∞ Please note that the prize will only be given to the FIRST person to answer a question correctly.  üîë Prizes will be distributed 14 days after the completion of the Token Sale.  ‚ö°Ô∏è You will have MANY chances to win a prize üöÄ  Good luck and may you all be quiz masters!

Author: chickaboom
Title: [ANN] CDRX - INTRODUCING A FUNDAMENTAL SHIFT IN GLOBAL FINANCIAL MARKETS
Body: Just a reminder everyone, don't forget about the quizzes, CDRX tokens and bragging rights are at stake!!üôåüôå  For those who like prizes, here's your chance to become a master quiz player üí™üí™üí™  Here is how it works:  ‚öôÔ∏è There will be 3 quizzes posted at random times every day, containing only one question. The first person to answer each question correctly will win 20 CDRX tokens.  All correct answers win admiration from the CDRX staff and moderators!  Each question will have a unique hashtag and participants will have to submit their answers using the same hashtag. If the hashtag of the question is #1 then you must start your response using #1. Please see the example below:  Question: #1 Do crypto depository receipts (CDRs) give you a legal right to a stock/bond, or just reference them?  Your response: #1 CDRs give you a legal ownership of a stock/bond [full answer for the master quiz player would also state that the stock/bond is held on the token holders' behalf by a depository bank/trust]  üí∞ Please note that the prize will only be given to the FIRST person to answer a question correctly.  üîë Prizes will be distributed 14 days after the completion of the Token Sale.  ‚ö°Ô∏è You will have MANY chances to win a prize üöÄ  Good luck and may you all be quiz masters! Author: chickaboom
Title: [ANN] CDRX - INTRODUCING A FUNDAMENTAL SHIFT IN GLOBAL FINANCIAL MARKETS
Body: Hi there and thanks a lot for your support, the team appreciates every one of their supporters. It's a given that the team is taking every aspect into consideration, their marketing model is indeed good and will make a difference long term. As to the current situation, the whole market is bearish and sentiment not great overall regarding projects and that is somewhat expected. That doesn't mean it will continue to be so forever  It comes down to delivering products and gaining traction and real adoption.
